# NumberFormatter.Behavior

**Enumeration**

These constants specify the behavior of a number formatter. These constants are returned by the [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/NumberFormatter/defaultFormatterBehavior()] class method and the [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/NumberFormatter/formatterBehavior] property.

## Declaration

```swift
enum Behavior
```

## Constants

- **NumberFormatter.Behavior.default**: The number-formatter behavior set as the default for new instances. You can set the default formatter behavior with the class method [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/NumberFormatter/setDefaultFormatterBehavior(_:)].
- **NumberFormatter.Behavior.behavior10_0**: The number-formatter behavior as it existed prior to macOS 10.4.
- **NumberFormatter.Behavior.behavior10_4**: The number-formatter behavior since macOS 10.4.
- **NumberFormatter.Behavior.default**: The number-formatter behavior set as the default for new instances. You can set the default formatter behavior with the class method [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/NumberFormatter/setDefaultFormatterBehavior(_:)].
- **NumberFormatter.Behavior.behavior10_0**: The number-formatter behavior as it existed prior to macOS 10.4.
- **NumberFormatter.Behavior.behavior10_4**: The number-formatter behavior since macOS 10.4.

## Initializers

- **init(rawValue:)**

## Constants

- **NumberFormatter.Style**: The predefined number format styles used by the [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/NumberFormatter/numberStyle] property.
- **NumberFormatter.PadPosition**: These constants are used to specify how numbers should be padded. These constants are used by the [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/NumberFormatter/paddingPosition] property.
- **NumberFormatter.RoundingMode**: These constants are used to specify how numbers should be rounded. These constants are used by the [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/NumberFormatter/roundingMode-swift.property] property.

## Conforms To

- BitwiseCopyable
- Equatable
- Hashable
- RawRepresentable
- Sendable
- SendableMetatype
